Stations must also pay postage both ways an the tapes shipped to and from ’Tetwork
Headquarters here in Urbana, Illinois. Still even a Class A station paying its
full third-year rate is paying only a little over $2.00 an hour far better than
400 hours of programing from the Network in a year. This is about the most
inexpensive programing a station can do.
If, after looking over the materials which we shall send you, you have further
questions, we shall be most happy to answer them.
Sincerely,
Harold E. Hill
Associate Director
